name: Deuter Race Lite Pack - Unisex
description: Sleek and light, this compact bike pack won't weigh you down on fast-and-light days. Well-thought-out pockets keep your essentials organized, and the mesh straps and back panel vent heat on hot, hard rides.Airstripes padding and channels allow air circulation to keep your back cool and dry on long uphills.Loop on the shoulder strap holds sunglasses.Stretch side pockets, a wet laundry compartment and zippered pockets keep you organized.Reflectors on all sides.Loop for attaching a light.Compatible with 2L hydration systems (sold separately).
